name: com.reachcloud.metaverse-cloud-sdk
description:
The Unity SDK for the Metaverse Cloud Engine

# Changelog

## 2.205.10
- Add FixTextMeshProUGUIOnPreRenderCanvasTryCatch to prevent NullReferenceException spam

Updated on January 15, 2026

## 2.205.9
- Remove null check for CurrentlyLoadedMetaSpaceDto in MetaSpace loading logic

Updated on January 13, 2026

## 2.205.8
- Add error handling for API client availability and ensure unique internal IDs for MetaverseScript components

Updated on January 13, 2026

## 2.205.7
- Fixed some prefabs not being displayed in prefab picker editor.

Updated on January 12, 2026

## 2.205.6
- Minor update

Updated on January 08, 2026

## 2.205.5
- Add screen ray block duration to prevent input during dragging

Updated on January 08, 2026

## 2.205.4
- Enhance drag-and-drop functionality by introducing a static Current property in DragGameObject and modifying selection logic. Update ScreenCameraRay to ignore clicks when dragging.

Updated on January 07, 2026

## 2.205.3
- - Updated Unity version and meta files.
- - Fixed formatting issue with FormatArguments function in MetaverseScript.

Updated on January 07, 2026

## 2.205.2
- Refactor asset querying and logging mechanisms; enhance audio clip preprocessing

Updated on December 22, 2025

## 2.205.1
- Fix compilation errors for OVRPlugin and SpeechToTextAgent on iOS and WebGL platforms

Updated on December 20, 2025
author: Reach Cloud
